Set-up
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(multcomp)
```

```{r}
getwd()
```

Load data
```{r}
vkgstats <- read_csv("Data/DataSupplementals/w1118Vkg_n.csv")
```

```{r}
vkgstats <- vkgstats %>%
  mutate(Weeks = factor(Weeks))
```

```{r}
ttest_res <- t.test(
  VkgIntensity ~ Weeks,
  data = vkgstats,
  var.equal = FALSE
)

p_val <- ttest_res$p.value

stars <- case_when(
  p_val < 0.001  ~ "***",
  p_val < 0.01   ~ "**",
  p_val < 0.05   ~ "*",
  TRUE           ~ "ns"
)

ttest_df <- data.frame(
  comparison = "6 Weeks",
  p_value = p_val,
  stars = stars
)

print(ttest_df)
```

```{r}
write.csv(
  ttest_df,
  "Results/ResultsSupplementals/StatsVkgTtest.csv",
  row.names = FALSE,
  quote = TRUE
)
```
